instructions.pitch: Tap when notes cross the center! Match the diva's perfect pitch!
instructions.rapid: Rapid TAP to rev the engine! Don't let it stall!
instructions.smooth: Gentle taps for a smooth serenade!
instructions.battle: TAP to parry grass attacks! Defend the pasture!
instructions.slow: Slow, deliberate taps for melancholy mood!
instructions.rock: Rock out with the rhythm! Feel the groove!
instructions.cosmic: TAP in cosmic harmony with the universe!
instructions.pop: Hit those pop beats with perfect timing!
instructions.electronic: Drop the bass with electronic beats!
